short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Features to help with using SpaceHey

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SpaceHey Buddy is an extension that is used to enhance your user experience within SpaceHey. Current features are:

- Night Mode (designed by Ikoe! https://spacehey.com/ikoe)
- Hide Cool New People section from home page
- Style Shredder to remove all styling from the currently viewed user profile
- Quick links for contact navigation
- 10/10 pupper named Buddy

More features on the horizon!
